text: It was a pleasure to meet with @POTUS and President @fhollande this morning, on the sidelines of UNGA #NigeriaUNGA https://t.co/z3nSRaCaKC

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: We're glad for every opportunity to reaffirm to the world our vision for a secure and prosperous #Nigeria #UNGA2016 https://t.co/vPWgIkKPwI

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Congratulations to Team Nigeria for an outstanding performance at the Paralympic Games—12 medals; top-performing African team. #Rio2016

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My Speech at today's Cabinet Retreat on the Economy—https://t.co/XkaenvjMZc

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: RT @AsoRock: ONGOING: Cabinet Retreat on the Economy, at the State House. Presided over by President @MBuhari. Ministers and Heads of Agenc…
retweet_text: ONGOING: Cabinet Retreat on the Economy, at the State House. Presided over by President @MBuhari. Ministers and Heads of Agencies attending

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Every time I see Gen Yakubu Gowon, I thank him for the NYSC, a worthy scheme that allows young Nigerians to see their country in new ways

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Youth Corpers serving in Daura visited me at home this afternoon. https://t.co/xO513jdajU

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: We will emerge from these difficult times. We are doing our best, I urge you to equally do your best.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: One area of special concern is job creation for our unemployed youth. Vice President @ProfOsinbajo is leading our efforts in this regard

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: On the economy, no doubt these are difficult times for Nigeria. Let me assure you we're doing our best to improve the lives of all Nigerians

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: On security, we have made tremendous progress against Boko Haram. We are now applying the same determination to the battle against militancy

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I wish all Nigerians a joyous Eid-El-Kabir. We will continue to work to make Nigeria a great nation. https://t.co/oUs2656bWH

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My Eid-El-Kabir message to Nigerians. I wish you all happy holidays. https://t.co/LwfQSQi6I8 https://t.co/DlHaMdie3U

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: RT @NGRPresident: "In our culture people who're successful don't appear like you, they're big men," @MBuhari joked w/ Mark Zuckerberg https…
retweet_text: "In our culture people who're successful don't appear like you, they're big men," @MBuhari joked w/ Mark Zuckerberg https://t.co/CdZXsQrocb

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Today I told Mark Zuckerberg, founder/CEO of Facebook, that for too long Nigeria has remained a country of potential—and we must change that

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Our gallant troops in the Northeast have already rescued thousands of people. We will never give up on the Chibok girls.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: What we will not do is waste time and resources on doubtful sources, who falsely claim to know the whereabouts of the Chibok girls.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I reiterated it in Nairobi, that we want our Chibok girls safe, we want them out. We're doing all we can to reunite them with their families

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Today in Nairobi, bilateral talks with Prime Minister @AbeShinzo of Japan, on the sidelines of #TICADVI https://t.co/wShwrV3qJW

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I wish the Sultan of Sokoto, Muhammadu Sa'ad Abubakar III, a happy 60th birthday, and Almighty Allah's blessings https://t.co/3GsDqfkIaf

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Always a pleasure to meet with @JohnKerry. We last met at the London Anti-Corruption Summit, in May. https://t.co/F4SFVFcwCj

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Under my watch we will work to ensure that there is no place for violence in the name of religion, ethnicity, or in any guise whatsoever.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My prayers are with the families of the victims.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I received news of the mob killings in Zamfara with great dismay. It is barbaric & unacceptable. I assure that the law will take its course

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Pastor Tunde Bakare, my running mate in 2011, visited this afternoon. Tunde is a man whose counsel I greatly respect https://t.co/XMqnjFMRWZ

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Nigeria remembers Dr. Ameyo Stella Adadevoh, who died on this day, two years ago, and whose heroic actions helped us contain the Ebola virus

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: While not relenting in the war on terrorism, we will also focus on fast-tracking the voluntary return of IDPs, & their rehab & reintegration

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: The outgoing Egyptian Amb today told me he travelled by road from Maiduguri to Yobe last month. This was once a journey no one dared to make

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Former Head of State, General Abdulsalami Abubakar visited today. https://t.co/H93pw4yVWf

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Happy Birthday to IBB. Hearty  congratulations on the milestone of attaining 75 years. I pray that Almighty Allah grants you many more years

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I'm equally proud of all our athletes flying the Nigerian flag in Rio. Well done to @cukogu, who made it to the finals of her event today

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: A good game from our Dream Team. Congratulations to them, and to all Nigerians.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My letter to young Nigerians, to mark International Youth Day. You are the  strength & future of Nigeria. #IYD2016 https://t.co/p2hJ3l1EIg

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Our commitment to cleaning, securing and empowering the Niger Delta is genuine. We made a promise, we will fulfill it.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Joseph Yobo was also a part of the delegation that visited me this morning https://t.co/5wtcJ364ad

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Professor Wole Soyinka visited this morning. We had quite a lot to talk about. https://t.co/0XJHozHIO0

text: Gov @MrUdomEmmanuel of Akwa Ibom visited today. I'm a big advocate of partnerships between the Federal & State Govts https://t.co/K3ecB29JO7

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Tomorrow I will join other Heads of State and Govt in N'Djamena for the inauguration ceremony of President Idriss Deby Itno of Chad

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: "The National Defence College symbolizes the height of military professionalism and excellence in Nigeria."—https://t.co/dQ7piazMft

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I rejoice with @GofamintNigeria as they turn 60. I wish them many more successful decades of fruitful service in God's Vineyard & to Nigeria

text: Today is yet another milestone in #NDCleanUp. I inaugurated the Gov Council & BoT, in fulfillment of our promise. https://t.co/1Jqkn6fju0

text: Aug 4, 2011, @UNEP released its Report on Ogoniland. 5 years to that day, we're fulfilling our promise to implement. https://t.co/GKKhsUFEyo

text: I just met with my predecessor, @GEJonathan, at the State House https://t.co/jvDY4Hs0fj

text: Governor Dickson visited today. We will continue to partner for peace and development in the Niger Delta. https://t.co/JdLMX9GVVm

text: Let me also thank our development partners: @WHO @UNICEF @gatesfoundation @AlikoDangote Fdn @USAID @CDCgov @Rotary and others #PolioFreeNG

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: We're committed to making the certification a reality, by supporting routine immunization, and revitalizing our primary health care system

text: The next major milestone for us as a country is the certification of polio-free status in 2017 by the World Health Organisation @WHO

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Today marks two years since the last case of wild poliovirus was reported in Nigeria. I congratulate all who have made this possible

name: Muhammadu Buhari

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Pick up your PVC by 22 March and vote for APC on 28 March & 11 April. Let's bring the Change Nigeria needs #BabaWhileYouWereGone

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I am #GladToBeBack to make the Change needed #BabaWhileYouWereGone

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Our collective strength, our ability to forge ahead in the toughest of times is what will allow us to restore Nigeria  #BabaWhileYouWereGone

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: The troubling issues that face the nation continue unabated - plummeting power production & naira value, petrol queues #BabaWhileYouWereGone

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Despite the sticks and stones, we choose to remain focused and direct our energies into forging a bright future #BabaWhileYouWereGone - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I am heartened to see that good humour and resolve rest deep in the hearts of those who seek Change. #BabaWhileYouWereGone - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Many thanks to my supporters for the #BabaWhileYouWereGone updates this weekend. They have made my day #GladToBeBack - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Your PVC empowers you all to show your support. Please collect yours and vote for Change on 28 March, and 11 April - GMB #ThingsWILLChange

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: If successful, Sen. Aisha Jummai Alhassan will be the first elected female governor in Nigeria. I urge you all to support her. - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: APC is committed to women's rights & empowerment, and our candidate for the Taraba governorship is one such example - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: I also extend my gratitude to all the women who are taking our message of Change to all corners of the country - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: They have been a constant of support for me, and I do my best every day to provide the same support for them - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: As we celebrate #IWD2015, I want to express my profound appreciation for all Nigerian women, especially my wife and daughters - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: A very happy birthday to the next Vice-President of Nigeria, @ProfOsinbajo. Your commitment to #Change inspires the nation #ThingsWILLChange

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: We thank everyone who has come out today to walk and act for change. This has been a deeply inspiring day. #ThingsWILLChange

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: We must reject a system that has turned one of world's largest crude exporters into an importer of petrol. Things must change. - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: But over the last several years our refineries have declined, and we are at the mercy of imports.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: In my time as NNPC chairman and Petroleum Minister in the late 70s, 2 of our 4 refineries were built, and domestic consumption catered for.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: The countless man hours that will be spent at petrol stations today, will reduce our productivity as a nation.This should not be so. - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: #ThingsWILLchange #GMB15 http://t.co/csodEEMvTv

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Together, we will rescue our dear country. Make no mistake, #ThingsWILLChange - GMB

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Before us there was Nigeria, and long after us there will be Nigeria. We will #Change Nigeria peacefully.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: This postponement should therefore only strengthen our resolve to save our country from the hands of marauders.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My deep faith in the democratic process assures me that with your support, our country will certainly overcome.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: in the face of certain defeat at the polls.

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: in the country and provide further justification to those who would want to exploit every situation to frustrate the democratic process

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: Our country is going through difficult times in the hands of terrorists. Any act of violence can only complicate the security challenges

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: But we must remain calm and peaceful, while resolute. Do not allow yourself be tempted or provoked to violence

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: As a Nigerian and a candidate in the elections, I share in the disappointment and frustration at this decision

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: To be clear, the postponement is a fraudulent attempt to subvert Nigeria's democracy. The world has seen this clearly

name: Muhammadu Buhari
text: My friends, I know many of you have waited for me to speak about the postponement of elections yesterday. - GMB
